title: How to cut and merge songs on my laptop - Quora

response.answer_text: audacity is very good for things like this, it will import nearly anything, and has some great functions for cut’n’paste and multitrack editing. oh, plus it’s freeware, and works great on Mac, Linux and PC

I am on a Dell running Windows 8,1,,,, No I don’t want Windows 10. BOLD in CAPS NO, I don;t want Apple… VLC is the best I have ever had, or used, or have seen. It is free-ware,,, plays everything. Located at video.org
